svcsubproc.title: Rear View Mirror - Passenger Side
svcsubproc.para: Locate the passenger side mirror brackets.
A ladder will be required to remove the passenger side mirror assembly.

step1.para: Loosen and remove the mirror bracket arm from mirror main support.

figure.caption: Figure 105. Passenger Side Rear View Mirror Removal

PASSENGER SIDE REAR VIEW MIRROR LATERAL BRACKET

PASSENGER SIDE REAR VIEW MIRROR LATERAL BRACE MOUNTING CLAMP AND MOUNTING NUT AND BOLT

step1.para: Swing mirror outward to access all four mounting bolts on door and window external pillar.
To access the mirror heater element connection, locate the "A" pillar cover on the inside of the bus entry at the windshield.
Remove the mounting screw cover caps, loosen and remove the "A" pillar cover mounting screws. Remove the pillar cover.
Loosen and remove mirror mounting bracket at mirror swing out base.
